segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s reaching for cookies, which seems innocent enough.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks incredibly wobbly beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed outwards, barely supporting his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it tilting backward precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any moment now, it could give way and send him tumbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could really hurt himself if he falls from that height.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below seems completely unconcerned about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just waiting patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, of course, is too busy to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so anxious watching him balance there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is truly a recipe for an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
